about_the_game: Become a Space Ranger, maintaining a Space Orchard. For this Demo you will land on Moonapple & perform basic tasks, before you are let out of the spaceship.
detailed_description: Become a Space Ranger, maintaining a Space Orchard. For this Demo you will land on Moonapple & perform basic tasks, before you are let out of the spaceship.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or faster (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 , AMD RX560 or faster
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 support

name: Space Ranger Appleseed Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or faster (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 , AMD RX560 or faster
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Become a Space Ranger, tending a Space Orchard. Fly across asteroid belts, drive across dusty moonscapes & make contact with the Space station to get your crop of space apples ready!
